DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this project is to develop, validate, and implement a tool to help manager hypertension in patients on hemodialysis.
DOC.brief_title: Use of a Hypertension Tool to Manage Blood Pressure in Hemodialysis
DOC.criteria: ≥ 18 years of age Receiving incentre HD for at least 3 months Considered hypertensive based on a median intradialytic blood pressure ≥ 140/90 mmgHG Are unable to provide informed consent Are deemed medically unstable by the primary physician
